Hey there, 👋

Welcome to C14!

🌎

If you want to list your company at the C14 exchange, reach out to us at c14forthefuture@gmail.com. May the Greenhouse gases NOT be with you!

It is necessary to have Metamask installed in your browser. 💸
(Make sure to connect to the Rinkeby testnet and transfer test ETH to interact with the application.)

You can obtain test ETH on this link. 🤑

You can choose any of the listed NFTs on the platform (keep in mind that not all are the same, they differ a lot in their attributes). 🦹

Mint your NFT and invite your friends to mint NFT and become a part of the amazing C14 community! 😎
